name: Shearling Jacket in Brown
details: A classic silhouette, reimagined in an oversized fit. Crafted from a tumbled Brown leather and black shearling lining. Front zip pockets and heavyweight zip closure. Leather tape seam details.

name: Mohair Work Shirt in Red
details: A slightly oversized work shirt made from a British made plaid Mohair and fully lined. Featuring side pockets and a single chest pocket. Front zip closure and buttoned cuffs. Contrast faux leather spread collar.

name: Velour Jacket in Brown
details: Relaxed fitting collared bomber jacket in black velour. Lined in cupro with pantone matched wool ribbing. Custom RiRi hardware and zips.
